content: double_crochet in next 4 sts 3 times repeat with each color in turn 18 sts worked in each color round 6 return to loop of a 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 5 sts 3 times repeat with each color in turn 21 sts worked in each color round 7 return to loop of a 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 6 sts 3 times repeat with each color in turn 24 sts worked in each color final taper note you will work each color in the reverse order on this round so that each band of the spiral swings around to end on one half of the potholder the tapering will become increasingly longer with each color continue with d half_double_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts fasten_off return to loop of c 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 times half_double_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts fasten_off return to loop of b 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 6 sts 4 times half_double_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts fasten off return to loop of a 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 6 sts 6 times half_double_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts fasten_off potholder back make as for potholder front © 2010 by pepperknit page 2 finishing tighten central hole as best you can without warping the fabric it will not close up entirely staying approximately ¼ in diameter weave in all ends edging place the potholder front and back together with wrong sides facing note that the holes will not align unless you have the potholders placed exactly right aligning the hole is not necessary note that half double_crochet is used for the edging as it looks nearly identical from front or back with e slip_stitch into one edge stitch the spot where you d like the loop to be of both the front and back at the same time half_double_crochet in that same space half_double_crochet around working into both the front and back together to join them after working the last stitch do not break yarn make loop below loop chain 8 slip_stitch into first stitch worked chain 2 turn half_double_crochet 16 times around the chain slip_stitch half_double_crochet into edging fasten_off weave in ends blocking blocking ensures that the piece lays completely flat let it soak for at least 30 minutes so that the cotton is fully saturated before laying out to dry don t hesitate to email me with questions or errata
